overview:
As Vice President of Advertiser Sales, Scott is responsible for leading Inadco’s advertiser sales team and driving the company’s revenue growth. With over eleven years of experience, Scott is one of the most knowledgeable and accomplished executives in the Cost-Per-Lead advertising industry.

Prior to joining Inadco, Scott served as Vice President, Strategic Accounts at LeadPoint where he led major account sales across multiple verticals for the company. Prior to that, Scott was the first advertiser sales hire at LowerMyBills.com where he led the national sales and account management team that was instrumental in growing the business from $10MM/year to over $200MM/year.
